price: Did you think that We created you with no purpose and that you would not be brought back to Us?”
arabic: أَفَحَسِبۡتُمۡ أَنَّمَا خَلَقۡنَٰكُمۡ عَبَثٗا وَأَنَّكُمۡ إِلَيۡنَا لَا تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
